channel.title: Startups on hack(pravj)
channel.description: Recent content in Startups on hack(pravj)

item.title: Heidi Roizen on ETL
item.description: Last week, Marco Arment launched a new product on HN, Overcast - An iPhone app that makes listening to podcasts much easier (and more fun). There was a lot of productive discussion which made me realize that I need to give podcasts a serious chance. Given that I would be travelling soon, I went ahead, downloaded the most popular podcast app for Android and added a couple of feeds (thanks to this HN thread for recommendations).

item.title: Why We Dont Sell Ads
item.description: I found this great statement made by the WhatsApp founders on their blog about why they don’t rely on ads and instead charge customers for the service. This is getting recirculated now that WhatsApp is looking at being acquired by Facebook at a valuation of around $19B. It interesting to see that while tons of apps rely on advertising as a key part of their business model there are companies who strive to go against it.
